trans-unit.source: Generic, multiple row results can be pulled from the database with get_results. The method returns the entire query result as an array. Each element of this array corresponds to one row of the query result and, like get_row, can be an object, an associative array, or a numbered array. If no matching rows are found, or if there is a database error, the return value will be an empty array. If your $query string is empty, or you pass an invalid $output_type, NULL will be returned.

trans-unit.source: How to order retrieved networks. Accepts 'ASC', 'DESC'. Default 'ASC'.
trans-unit.target: 如何对检索到的网络进行排序。接受'ASC','DESC'。默认为'ASC'。

trans-unit.source: How to order retrieved sites. Accepts 'ASC', 'DESC'. Default 'ASC'.
trans-unit.target: 如何对检索到的网站进行排序。接受'ASC','DESC'。默认为'ASC'。

trans-unit.source: How to order the bookmark category based on term scheme if $categorize is true. Default 'name'.

trans-unit.source: How to order the links by. Accepts 'id', 'link_id', 'name', 'link_name', 'url', 'link_url', 'visible', 'link_visible', 'rating', 'link_rating', 'owner', 'link_owner', 'updated', 'link_updated', 'notes', 'link_notes', 'description', 'link_description', 'length' and 'rand'. When $orderby is 'length', orders by the character length of 'link_name'. Default 'name'.
How to order the links by. Accepts post fields. Default 'name'.
trans-unit.target: 如何按链接排序。接受帖子字段。默认为'name'。

trans-unit.source: How to order the tags. Accepts 'ASC' (ascending), 'DESC' (descending), or 'RAND' (random). Default 'ASC'.
trans-unit.target: 如何排序标签。接受'ASC'(升序)、'DESC'(降序)或'RAND'(随机)。默认为'ASC'。

trans-unit.source: How to sort retrieved pages. Accepts 'ASC', 'DESC'. Default 'ASC'.
trans-unit.target: 如何对检索到的页面进行排序。接受'ASC','DESC'。默认为'ASC'。

trans-unit.source: How to sort the authors. Accepts 'nicename', 'email', 'url', 'registered', 'user_nicename', 'user_email', 'user_url', 'user_registered', 'name', 'display_name', 'post_count', 'ID', 'meta_value', 'user_login'. Default 'name'.

trans-unit.source: How to sort the list of pages. Accepts post column names. Default 'menu_order, post_title'.
trans-unit.target: 如何对页面列表进行排序。接受帖子的列名,默认为'menu_order,post_title'。默认为'menu_order,post_title'。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the network and site of a requested domain and path and populates the corresponding network and site global objects as part of the multisite bootstrap process.
trans-unit.target: 识别请求的域和路径的网络和站点,并填充相应的网络和站点全局对象,作为多站点引导过程的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Identify an existing table alias that is compatible with the current query clause.
trans-unit.target: 确定一个与当前查询子句兼容的现有表别名。

trans-unit.target: 在页面对象列表中识别给定页面ID的后裔。

trans-unit.source: If
trans-unit.target: If

trans-unit.source: If $allow_bail is false, the lack of database connection will need to be handled manually.
trans-unit.target: 如果$allow_bail为false,则需要手动处理数据库连接的缺失。

trans-unit.source: If $check_urls is empty, look for the rss feed url found in the dashboard widget options of $widget_id. If cached, call $callback, a function that echoes out output for this widget. If not cache, echo a "Loading…" stub which is later replaced by Ajax call (see top of /wp-admin/index.php)
trans-unit.target: 如果$ check_urls为空，请在$ widget_id的仪表板小部件选项中查找rss feed URL。如果已缓存，请调用$ callback，此函数会回显此小部件的输出。如果没有缓存，则回显一个“ Loading…”存根，稍后将其替换为Ajax调用（请参见/wp-admin/index.php的顶部）

trans-unit.source: If $data is not an string, then returned value will always be false. Serialized data is always a string.
trans-unit.target: 如果$data不是字符串,那么返回的值将总是false。序列化的数据总是一个字符串,如果$data不是字符串,那么返回的值将总是false。

trans-unit.source: If $file_path is a writable filename, this will do a GET request and write the file to that path.
trans-unit.target: 如果$file_path是一个可写的文件名,这将做一个GET请求并将文件写入该路径。

trans-unit.source: If $gmt is set to either ‘1’ or ‘true’, then both types will use GMT time. if $gmt is false, the output is adjusted with the GMT offset in the WordPress option.
trans-unit.target: 如果$ gmt设置为'1'或'true'，则两种类型都将使用GMT时间。如果$ gmt为false，则使用WordPress选项中的GMT偏移量调整输出。

trans-unit.source: If $translate is true then the given date and format string will be passed to date_i18n() for translation.
trans-unit.target: 如果$ translate为true，则给定的日期和格式字符串将传递给date_i18n（）进行翻译。

trans-unit.source: If $type is ‘delete’, the classes are ‘button delete’.

If $user_id is not a number, then the function will fail over with a ‘false’ boolean return value. Other returned values depend on whether there is only one item to be returned, which be that single item type. If there is more than one metadata value, then it will be list of metadata values.
trans-unit.target: 如果$ user_id不是数字，则该函数将使用“ false”布尔值返回值进行故障转移。其他返回值取决于是否只有一个项目要返回，即单个项目类型。如果有多个元数据值，那么它将是元数据值列表。

trans-unit.source: If $value does not exist, the return value will be false. If $taxonomy exists and $field and $value combinations exist, the Term will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果$value不存在,返回值将为false。如果$taxonomy存在,并且$field和$value的组合存在,那么将返回Term。

If ‘rtl’, an addtional stylesheet will be loaded, allowing custom styling targeting right-to-left.
If 'list', each author is wrapped in an <li> element, otherwise the authors will be separated by commas.

trans-unit.source: If switch_to_blog() was called after the preview() method, and the current site is now not the same site, then this method does a no-op and returns the original value.
trans-unit.target: 如果在Preview（）方法之后调用了switch_to_blog（），并且当前站点现在不是同一站点，则此方法不执行操作并返回原始值。

trans-unit.source: If do_blocks() needs to remove wpautop() from the the_content filter, this re-adds it afterwards, for subsequent the_content usage.

trans-unit.target: 如果wp_is_large_network（）返回

trans-unit.source: If $action is ‘query_plugins’ or ‘plugin_information’, an object MUST be passed. If $action is ‘hot_tags’ or ‘hot_categories’, an array should be passed.
trans-unit.target: 如果 $action 是'query_plugins'或'plugin_information'，则必须传递一个对象。如果 $action 是'hot_tags'或'hot_categories'，则应传递一个数组。

trans-unit.source: If $action is ‘query_themes’, ‘theme_information’, or ‘feature_list’, an object MUST be passed. If $action is ‘hot_tags’, an array should be passed.
trans-unit.target: 如果 $action 为'query_themes'，'theme_information'或'feature_list'，则必须传递一个对象。如果 $action 为'hot_tags'，则应传递一个数组。

trans-unit.source: If $args['settings'] is not defined, use the $id as the setting ID.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定义 $args['settings'] ，请使用$ id作为设置ID。

trans-unit.source: If $code is empty, the other parameters will be ignored. When $code is not empty, $message will be used even if it is empty. The $data parameter will be used only if it is not empty.
trans-unit.target: 如果 $code 为空，则其他参数将被忽略。当 $code 不为空时，将使用 $message 即使它为空。在 $data 参数将只用于如果不是空的。

trans-unit.source: If $data is an instance of Requests_Response, uses the status code from it. Otherwise, sets as 0
trans-unit.target: 如果 $data 是Requests_Response的实例，则使用其中的状态代码。否则设置为0

trans-unit.source: If $mode equals ‘excerpt’, the published time and date are both displayed. If $mode equals ‘list’ (default), the publish date is displayed, with the time and date together available as an abbreviation definition.
trans-unit.target: 如果 $mode 等于“摘录”，则显示发布的时间和日期。如果 $mode 等于“ list”（默认值），则显示发布日期，同时将时间和日期作为缩写定义可用。

trans-unit.source: If $name matches a post field, the comment post will be loaded and the post’s value checked.
trans-unit.target: 如果 $name 与帖子字段匹配，则将加载评论帖子并检查帖子的值。

trans-unit.source: If $name matches a post field, the comment post will be loaded and the post’s value returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 $name 与帖子字段匹配，则将加载评论帖子，并返回该帖子的值。

trans-unit.source: If $terms is an array of objects, then _get_term_children() returns an array of objects. If $terms is an array of IDs, then _get_term_children() returns an array of IDs.
trans-unit.target: 如果 $terms 是一个对象数组，则_get_term_children（）返回一个对象数组。如果 $terms 是ID数组，则_get_term_children（）返回ID数组。

trans-unit.source: If $title is empty and $fallback_title is set, the latter will be used.
If $translate is true then the given date and format string will be passed to wp_date() for translation.

trans-unit.source: If <var>$feed</var> is true, extra rewrite rules will be generated for obtaining a feed of the current page, and if <var>$forcomments</var> is true, this will be a comment feed.
If <var>$page</var> is true, an extra rewrite rule will be generated for accessing different pages (e.g. /category/tech/page/2 points to the second page of the ‘tech’ category archive).

If <var>$walk_dirs</var> is true, then a rewrite rule will be generated for each directory of the structure provided, e.g. if you provide it with ‘/%year%/%month%/%day/’, rewrite rules will be generated for ‘/%year%/’, /%year%/%month%/’ and ‘/%year%/%month%/%day%/’.
If Multisite is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了多站点。

trans-unit.source: If Trash is disabled, comment is permanently deleted.
If Trash is disabled, the post or page is permanently deleted.
If a blog is marked as not being public then the noindex meta tag will be output to tell web robots not to index the page content. Add this to the ‘wp_head’ action.
trans-unit.target: 如果博客被标记为不公开，则将输出noindex元标记以告诉Web机器人不要对页面内容进行索引。将此添加到“ wp_head”操作中。

trans-unit.source: If a child theme is used, both the current child and parent theme directories are tested and both the files with the same relative path are linked with this single call if they are found.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用子主题,则对当前的子主题和父主题目录都进行测试,如果发现有相同相对路径的文件,都会用这个单次调用进行链接。

trans-unit.source: If a directory and $recursive is true, contains another array of files.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个目录且$recursive为true,则包含另一个文件数组。

trans-unit.source: If a dynamic block is added to this list, it must not generate another excerpt, as this will cause an infinite loop to occur.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个动态块被添加到这个列表中,就不能再生成另一个摘录,因为这会导致一个无限循环的发生。

trans-unit.source: If a falsey value is returned instead of an object, the menu items meta box for the current meta box object will not be added.
trans-unit.target: 如果返回一个falsey值而不是一个对象,则不会添加当前元盒对象的菜单项元盒。

trans-unit.source: If a file exists in the wp-content directory named db-error.php, then it will be loaded instead of displaying the WordPress DB error. If it is not found, then the WordPress DB error will be displayed instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果在wp-content目录中存在名为db-error.php的文件,那么它将被加载,而不是显示WordPress DB错误。如果它不存在,则会显示WordPress DB错误。

trans-unit.source: If a network and site are found, a true response will be returned so that the request can continue.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到网络和站点，则将返回 true 响应，以便请求可以继续。

trans-unit.source: If a non-empty string is passed, the filter is evaluated on the wp_richedit_pre() return after being formatted.
trans-unit.target: 如果传递了非空字符串，则在格式化后对wp_richedit_pre（）返回值求值。

trans-unit.source: If a non-null value is passed to the filter, moving the file and any related error reporting will be completely skipped.
trans-unit.target: 如果传递给过滤器一个非空值,移动文件和任何相关的错误报告将被完全跳过。

trans-unit.source: If a non-null value is returned from the filter, moving the file and any related error reporting will be completely skipped.
If a plugin is silently activated (such as during an update), this hook does not fire.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个插件被静静地激活了(比如在更新期间),这个钩子就不会启动。

trans-unit.source: If a plugin is silently deactivated (such as during an update), this hook does not fire.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个插件被静静地停用(比如在更新期间),这个钩子不会启动。

trans-unit.source: If a post/page was saved, then output JavaScript to make an Ajax request that will call WP_Embed::cache_oembed().
trans-unit.target: 如果保存了帖子/页面，则输出JavaScript发出Ajax请求，该请求将调用WP_Embed :: cache_oembed（）。

trans-unit.source: If a redirect was provided and a functions.php file was found, we first ensure that functions.php file does not throw fatal errors anymore.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了重定向,并且发现了一个functions.php文件,我们首先要确保functions.php文件不会再抛出致命错误。

trans-unit.source: If a redirect was provided, we first ensure the plugin does not throw fatal errors anymore.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了重定向,我们首先确保插件不会再抛出致命的错误。

trans-unit.source: If a registered image size is removed from functions.php, then any image uploaded before that point and then deleted from the media library afterwards, does not have those auto-generated sizes deleted too. Only image sizes that exist in functions.php are deleted.
trans-unit.target: 如果从function.php中删除了注册的图片大小,那么在该点之前上传的图片和之后从媒体库中删除的图片不会被自动生成的大小也被删除。只有存在于function.php中的图片尺寸才会被删除。

trans-unit.source: If a static page is set for the front page of the site, this function will return true only on the page you set as the "Posts page".
trans-unit.target: 如果网站首页设置了静态页面,那么只有在您设置为 "帖子页面 "的页面上,这个函数才会返回true。

trans-unit.source: If a table only contains utf8 or utf8mb4 columns, convert it to utf8mb4.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个表只包含utf8或utf8mb4列,将其转换为utf8mb4。

trans-unit.source: If a transient exists, this function will update the transient’s expiration time.

If a user does not belong to any site, the global user dashboard is used. If the user belongs to the current site, the dashboard for the current site is returned. If the user cannot edit the current site, the dashboard to the user’s primary site is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户不属于任何站点，则使用全局用户仪表板。如果用户属于当前站点，则返回当前站点的仪表板。如果用户无法编辑当前站点，则返回用户主站点的仪表板。

trans-unit.source: If a user visits example.com/admin, they’ll be redirected to /wp-admin. Visiting /login redirects to /wp-login.php, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户访问example.com/admin，他们将被重定向到/ wp-admin。访问/ login重定向到/wp-login.php，依此类推。

trans-unit.source: If adding widget options, WP_Widget::update() and WP_Widget::form() should also be overridden.
trans-unit.target: 如果添加窗口小部件选项，则WP_Widget :: update（）和WP_Widget :: form（）也应被覆盖。

trans-unit.source: If after enabling pretty permalinks don’t work, fallback to query-string permalinks.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用漂亮的永久链接后仍不起作用，请回退到查询字符串永久链接。

trans-unit.source: If all checks pass, the function will return true.
trans-unit.target: 如果所有检查都通过,函数将返回true。

trans-unit.source: If an Absolute URL is provided, no processing of that URL is done.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供绝对URL,则不对该URL进行处理。

trans-unit.source: If an ID is passed with the categories array that is not associated with a valid category, it will be stripped before the object terms are updated and from the return array.
If an array in the form of array( x_crop_position, y_crop_position ):

trans-unit.source: If an array is given then it is assumed to be raw header data with numeric keys with the headers as the values. No headers must be passed that were already processed.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定了一个数组,那么它被认为是带有数字键的原始头数据,头数据为值。不能传递已经处理过的头数据。

trans-unit.source: If an array is passed, the array_map() function causes a callback to pass the value back to the function. The slashes from each value will be removed using the stripslashes() function.
If an explicit $ids array is not present, this parameter will determine which attachments are used for the playlist. Default is the current post ID.

trans-unit.source: If an object is in more than one of the terms passed to $terms, the results returned will contain duplicate object_ids.

If an object is passed then the comment data will be cached and then returned after being passed through a filter. If the comment is empty, then the global comment variable will be used, if it is set.
trans-unit.target: 如果传递一个对象,那么注释数据将被缓存,然后通过过滤器后返回。如果注释为空,那么将使用全局注释变量,如果它被设置的话。

trans-unit.source: If an object type does not support any subtypes, such as users or comments, you should commonly call this function without passing a subtype.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个对象类型不支持任何子类型,如用户或注释,通常应该在不传递子类型的情况下调用这个函数。

trans-unit.source: If an object-cache.php file exists in the wp-content directory, it uses that drop-in as an external object cache.
trans-unit.target: 如果在wp-content目录下存在object-cache.php文件,则使用该drop-in作为外部对象缓存。

trans-unit.source: If any errors are found or text is outputted, then it will be captured to ensure that the success redirection will update the error redirection.
trans-unit.target: 如果发现有错误,或者有文字输出,那么就会被捕获,以确保成功重定向会更新错误重定向。

trans-unit.source: If any errors are present in $errors, this will abort the user’s registration.
trans-unit.target: 如果$ errors中出现任何错误，这将中止用户的注册。

trans-unit.source: If any of the currently registered image sub-sizes are missing, create them and update the image meta data.
If any of the settings need to be changed, this can be done with another js file similar to media-upload.js. That file should require array(‘thickbox’) to ensure it is loaded after.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要更改任何设置，可以使用类似于media-upload.js的另一个js文件来完成。该文件应要求使用array（'thickbox'）才能确保在以后加载。

trans-unit.source: If assigned, WordPress ignores the pages assigned to display the site front page or the blog posts index
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了,WordPress会忽略指定显示网站首页或博客文章索引的页面。

trans-unit.source: If attempt to register or enqueue an already registered handle with different parameters, the new parameters will be ignored. Instead, use wp_deregister_script() and register the script again with the new parameters.
trans-unit.target: 如果尝试使用不同的参数注册或排队已注册的句柄，则新参数将被忽略。而是使用wp_deregister_script（）并使用新参数再次注册脚本。

trans-unit.source: If attempt to register or enqueue an already registered handle with different parameters, the new parameters will be ignored. Instead, use wp_deregister_script() and register the script again with the new parameters.

If changes were just submitted ($_GET[‘settings-updated’]) and settings errors were saved to the ‘settings_errors’ transient then those errors will be returned instead. This is used to pass errors back across pageloads.
trans-unit.target: 如果仅提交更改（$ _GET ['settings-updated']），并且设置错误已保存到“ settings_errors”瞬态中，则将返回这些错误。这用于将错误传回整个页面加载。

trans-unit.source: If changeset branching is allowed; otherwise, changesets are linear. Defaults to true.
trans-unit.target: 如果允许变化集分支,否则变化集是线性的。默认值为true。

trans-unit.source: If current user’s password is being updated, then the cookies will be cleared.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前用户的密码正在更新，则cookie将被清除。

trans-unit.source: If data from a changeset's autosaved revision should be loaded if it exists. Defaults to false.

If either width or height are empty, no constraint is applied on that dimension.

trans-unit.target: 如果通过“ enable_live_network_counts”过滤器启用，则在创建网站或更新其状态时更新网络上的网站计数。

trans-unit.source: If false (default), images will be scaled, not cropped.
trans-unit.target: 如果为false(默认),图像将被缩放,而不是裁剪。

trans-unit.source: If false (default), images will not be cropped.

trans-unit.source: If greater than 1, comment page will be determined for the top-level parent $comment_ID. Defaults to the value of the 'thread_comments_depth' option.
If greater than 1, comment page will be determined for the top-level parent of $comment_ID. Defaults to the value of the 'thread_comments_depth' option.
trans-unit.target: 如果大于1，将为 $comment_ID 的顶级父级确定注释页面。默认为'thread_comments_depth'选项的值。

trans-unit.source: If installing the ‘wp-admin/’ directory will be replaced with ‘./’.
trans-unit.target: 如果安装“ wp-admin /”目录，则将替换为“ ./”。

trans-unit.source: If it is assumed that every file will be copied over, including plugins and themes, then if you edit the default theme, you should rename it, so that your changes remain.
trans-unit.target: 如果假设每一个文件都会被复制过来,包括插件和主题,那么如果你编辑默认主题,你应该重命名它,这样你的变化就会保留下来。

trans-unit.source: If it’s determined that the extension does not match the file’s real type, then the "proper_filename" value will be set with a proper filename and extension.
trans-unit.target: 如果确定扩展名与文件的实型不匹配，则将使用正确的文件名和扩展名设置“ proper_filename”值。

trans-unit.source: If it’s found, then it upgrades any basic name => value pairs to WP_Http_Cookie instances, which are each parsed into strings and added to the Cookie: header (within the arguments array). Edits the array by reference.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到它，则它将所有基本名称=>值对升级为WP_Http_Cookie实例，每个实例都解析为字符串并添加到Cookie：标头（在arguments数组内）。通过引用编辑数组。

trans-unit.source: If it’s the same as the current request URL, will return false.
trans-unit.target: 如果与当前请求URL相同，则将返回false。

trans-unit.source: If just hour, minute, or second is set than a normal comparison will be done. However if multiple values are passed, a pseudo-decimal time will be created in order to be able to accurately compare against.
trans-unit.target: 如果只设置了时、分、秒,将进行正常的比较。但是,如果传递多个值,将创建一个伪小数时间,以便能够准确地进行比较。

trans-unit.source: If manual comment moderation is set in the administration, then all checks, regardless of their type and substance, will fail and the function will return false.
